email.subject: Hey.
email.body:
Hey there, #PLAYERNAME#. Glad you could come with us earlier today! You said you wanted to get into Hacking, network security and stuff so I thought I'd help you through starting. We have no real jobs for you so we're gonna let you have a bit of fun.
We have a Raspberry pi with some starter tools. I'll send you the IP to that, and I'll let you loose. Message me back when you have SSHCrack.exe

attachments.note: Connect to the raspberry Pi and use the command PortHack to gain full access to it. after that, go to the bin folder and download SSHCrack.exe!
